title: The Incredible Week of Ling Simmons: From Counselor to Hero
summary: Ling Simmons, a 51-year-old counseling instructor, unknowingly gains powers from a cosmic storm, uses these abilities to save his city, and learns the importance of believing in one’s hidden strengths.
summaryGerman: Ling Simmons, ein 51-jähriger Ausbilder für Beratung, erhält unwissentlich Kräfte aus einem kosmischen Sturm, nutzt diese Fähigkeiten, um seine Stadt zu retten, und lernt die Bedeutung, an seine verborgenen Stärken zu glauben.
summaryDutch: Ling Simmons, een 51-jarige instructeur in counseling, krijgt onbewust krachten van een kosmische storm, gebruikt deze vaardigheden om zijn stad te redden, en leert het belang van geloven in zijn verborgen krachten.
summaryFrench: Ling Simmons, un instructeur de conseil de 51 ans, acquiert à son insu des pouvoirs d'une tempête cosmique, utilise ces capacités pour sauver sa ville et apprend l'importance de croire en ses forces cachées.

story.text: Ling Simmons begins his week normally, teaching and counseling at the local community center. However, he feels an eerie sensation after a sudden storm during his commute home.
The next day, Ling notices he can hear conversations from far away, initially dismissing it as exhaustion. His curiosity piques as he accidentally overhears a cry for help blocks away.
Seizing the courage, Ling follows the distant cries and rescues a cat trapped on a high ledge. He climbs with unexplained agility and speed, saving the cat and beginning to realize his new powers.
With his confidence growing, Ling starts experimenting with his abilities, discovering he can also move objects with his mind. He spends the day helping neighbors in secret.
Ling becomes a talk of the town. Eyewitnesses of his secret heroics lead to communal gossip and mystery. Ling feels both thrilled and overwhelmed by his unintended fame.
After a local bridge begins to collapse, Ling, without hesitation, uses his powers in public for the first time, holding the bridge together long enough for everyone to cross safely.
Reflecting on his week, Ling decides to embrace his role as a hero. He starts planning how to balance his life as a counselor and his responsibilities as a newfound protector of the city.

ending: And so, Ling Simmons learned that sometimes, the greatest powers come from the most unexpected places.
moral: Embrace the unexpected, for one's true potential might be hidden just beneath the surface.
